Project Title: OSTPDL1, A Phase II Trial of Avelumab, a Fully Human Antibody that Targets Cells Expressing PDL1 in Patients with Recurrent or Progressive Osteosarcoma
Study Title: OSTPDL1, A Phase II Trial of Avelumab, a Fully Human Antibody that Targets Cells Expressing PDL1 in Patients with Recurrent or Progressive Osteosarcoma
Duration of Treatment: Up to 24 months, or 26 cycles (with therapy administered every 2 weeks)
